name: Aura•Borus
description:
Well, it isn't finished but it is "done"!

Aura•Borus is a rogue-lite dungeon crawl (or at least it will be) with a twist! You have four abilities but you have to use them in order. Use them to complete dungeon cycles to turn your Aura into buffs and new spells!

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-Controls-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

Use an Xbox 360 Controller for best results (AKA kbm controls not fully working at the moment!)

Move - Left Stick | WASD

Aim - Right Stick | Mouse

Attack - Right Bumper | Left Click

Select - A Button | E/Enter

•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-Concept -•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•-•

The idea for Aura•Borus was to have the player make strategic decisions about what kind of spell cycle they wanted to fit their play style while still making it general enough to be useful in many dungeons. The Dungeons would come in sets of four called Cycles. Each Cycle is held in a Disk The player places the Disk into the Spinner activating a magic door taking them to the next dungeon. Once in the dungeon the player searched for an Orb that will take them back home. When the orb from each dungeon is collected the Disk will shatter and the player must get a new one by defeating the Disk Guardian to get a new one and start a new Cycle.
